HPI 8090 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1993 JTC Series 10th/9th Place O. Hagiwara/Y. Hane

Manufacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/index_8090.php

Osamu Hagiwara and Yukihiro Hane dove this HKS Racing Skyline with "look at me!" livery in the final season of the Group A-based JTC championship (and the last appearance of the Skyline in the series). Their best result was a win in round 3 at Sugo.

Hagiwara & Hane finished the season in 10th & 9th places respectively.
